divs: Sighting DetailsUfo craft seen in wagga wagga nsw which was very bright like a star but bigger, no aviation lights that flashed I witnessed it with sothe ceone else and after a while it just disapeared like turning off a light witch, a minute later a commet fell a few miles back from the crafts path of travel. I observed it traveling west to south and.it was a steady speed and did not.vary in luminocity or shape.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wagga Wagga
